  • Wallets

Wallets

Bitcoin and BOB​

Wallets that can be used for both Bitcoin and BOB.

MetaMask with Snaps​

MetaMask with BOB Bitcoin Snap​

  • Type: Browser
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

MetaMask with Zion Bitcoin Snap​

MetaMask is a browser extension that allows you to interact with EVM-compatible blockchains. The Zion Bitcoin Snap is a MetaMask extension that allows you to interact with Bitcoin.

  • Type: Browser
  • Features: Bitcoin, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

Phantom​

  • Type: Browser, Android, iOS
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

OKX Wallet​

  • Type: Browser, Android, iOS, Desktop
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Mainnet

FoxWallet​

  • Type: Android, iOS
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Mainnet

Pontem Wallet​

  • Type: Browser, Android, iOS,
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20, EVM
  • Networks: Any EVM network, Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

Bitcoin​

Wallets that only support Bitcoin.

UniSat​

Open Source Chrome Extension for Bitcoin, Ordinals, and BRC20. Integration can be achieved through the Wallet API.

  • Type: Browser
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20
  • Networks: Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

Xverse​

A wallet for Bitcoin, Ordinals, and BRC20. Check out the Xverse documentation for more information.

  • Type: Browser, Android, iOS
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20
  • Networks: Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

Leather​

A wallet for Bitcoin, Ordinals, and BRC20. Check out the Leather documentation for more information.

  • Type: Browser, Desktop
  • Features: Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC20
  • Networks: Bitcoin Testnet, Mainnet

Electrum​

Electrum is an advanced Bitcoin wallet. Electrum is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android.

More Wallets​

For a complete list of wallets, see Bitcoin.org.

BOB​

You can use any OP Stack-compatible wallet with BOB. We recommend using WalletConnect for managing Dapp-to-wallet connections.

WalletConnect v2.0​

WalletConnect is an open protocol to communicate securely between Dapps and Wallets.

  • List of supported wallets: EVM wallets
